SystemColumn.ValidationFormula:
LET $databaseDateLastUpdated := IF( [RecordID] > 0, DB_LOOKUP("DateLastUpdated", "Submission", "[LineNumber] = 1 AND [RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID])), NULL() );
RETURN IF( AND( [RecordID] > 0, N($thisValue) < N($databaseDateLastUpdated) ), "Changes were made to this submission. Please refresh the page", NULL )

SystemColumn.Formula: [Type] & IF( [Round]>0, "(Round "&[Round]& ")" )& IF( [Status]=="Approved", " Approved", [Status]=="Rejected", " (Rejected: " & DATEFORMAT([Date Rejected], "dd-MMM-yyyy") & " by " & [Rejected By] & ")", [Status]=="Submitted", " (Submitted: " & DATEFORMAT([Date Submitted], "dd-MMM-yyyy") & " by " & [Submitted By] & ")", [Status]=="Draft", " (Draft)" ) & " / Originator: " & [Originator] & IF( [Status] = "Submitted", " / Next Approver: " & [Next Approver] )

Column.Name: Next Approver Type
Submitter Notes
Column.Formula: IF( AND( [Status] <> "Draft", [Submitter Notes] = NULL() ), "No notes provided", [Submitter Notes] )

Column.Name: Approver Types Already Done
Column.Formula: DB_LOOKUPALL("Approver Type", "Approval Event", "[Event Type] IN ('Approved (Final)', 'Approved')", HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID)))

Column.Name: Next Approver
Column.Formula:
LET $inProgress := ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Approver Decision], "In Progress");
RETURN IF( [Status] = "Draft", [Approver], [Approver]#($inProgress+1) )

Column.Name: Approval History Data
Parent EFormType
Column.Formula: ARRAY_FIRST([Parent Record])

Column.Name: Parent RecordID
Column.Formula: ARRAY_LAST([Parent Record])

Column.Name: Custom Approvers
Column.Formula:
IF( AND( [Adhoc Submission] = TRUE, [Custom Approvers] == NULL() ), TRUE,
[Custom Approvers] )

Column.Name: Department
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Department", [Parent EFormType], HASH("RecordID", [Parent RecordID]) ), NULL() )

Column.Name: Submitter Display Name
Column.Formula: EBMS_GET_ROLE_DISPLAYNAME([Submitted By])

Column.Name: Approver Display Name
Column.Formula: EBMS_GET_ROLE_DISPLAYNAME([Approved By])

Column.Name: Days in Process
Approver Decision
Column.Formula: HASH_GET(HASH_GET([Approval History Data], [Approval GUID]), "Status")

Column.Name: Approver Decision Date
Column.Formula: HASH_GET(HASH_GET([Approval History Data], [Approval GUID]), "Date")

Column.Name: Decision Maker
Column.Formula: HASH_GET(HASH_GET([Approval History Data], [Approval GUID]), "Approver")

Column.Name: Decision Maker Username
Column.Formula: HASH_GET(HASH_GET([Approval History Data], [Approval GUID]), "Performed by")

Column.Name: Approver Comment
Current User
Column.Formula:
IF( EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER() = "external", [Assignee],
EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER() )

Column.Name: Cumulative Variation to Date Plus This Variation
Cumulative Variation to Date Plus This Variation Dollar Value
Variation Percent of Initial Contract Value Incl. Tax
Sort Order
Column.Formula: IF( [Status] = "Submitted", 1, [Status] = "Draft", 2, [Status] = "Approved", 4, [Status] = "Rejected", 5, [Status] = "Cancelled", 6, 3 // the goal was that status' that aren't catered for should be seen high in the list rather then being pushed to the back where they might not be seen )

Column.Name: Guest Account
Column.Formula: HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Everyone") <> TRUE

Column.Name: Parent Reference
Adhoc Submission
Column.Formula: EBMS_GET_PARENT_RECORD(EFormType, RecordID) = NULL()

Column.Name: DocuSign Integration
Column.Formula: DB_LOOKUP("DocuSign Integration", "Settings - Approval", "[RecordID] = 1")

Column.Name: Approval GUID
Column.Formula:
IF( [LineExists] <> TRUE, NULL(),
AND( [Approval GUID] = NULL(), [Found Approver] <> NULL() ), NEWUUID(), [Approval GUID] )

Column.Name: Approval Type
Approver Email Address
Column.Formula:
LET $emailAddress := EBMS_GET_ROLE_EMAIL_ADDRESSES([Approver], TRUE);
RETURN IF( AND( [Status] = "Draft", [Demo Mode] = TRUE, OR($emailAddress = "", $emailAddress = NULL), [Approver is System User] = TRUE ), "person@business.com",
AND( [Status] = "Draft", [Approver is System User] = TRUE ), $emailAddress,
AND( [User Type] = "Contact", [Contact] <> NULL() ), [Contact],
[Approver Email Address] )

Column.Name: Approver is System User
Column.Formula: [User Type] = "System User"

Column.Name: Found Approver
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Approver], [External Approver Name], [Contact Name])

Column.Name: Found Approver Name
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Approver Name], [External Approver Name], [Contact Name])

Column.Name: Approver Audit Name
Submission Document URLs
Column.Formula: ARRAY_SELECT(EBMS_GET_ATTACHMENTS(EFormType, RecordID, "Submission Documents"), $(i, item) "files/eformrecords/" & URLENCODE(EFormType) & "/" & RecordID & "/" & "Submission Documents/" & HASH_GET($item, "FileName"))

Column.Name: Enable External Approvals
Column.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "Enable External Approvals", "Settings - Approval", "[RecordID] = 1" )

Column.Name: Assigned Approval Batch
Column.Formula: IF( [Status] = "Draft", NULL(), [Assigned Approval Batch] )

Column.Name: Approval Batch
Batch Approvals Enabled
Column.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "Batch Approval Enabled", "Settings - Approval", "[RecordID] = 1" ) = TRUE

Column.Name: Current Approval Type
Column.Formula: LET $line := ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Approver Decision], "In Progress"); RETURN [Approval Type]#$line

Column.Name: DocuSign Document Attached
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( $thisValue <> TRUE, [DocuSign Approval] = TRUE ), "Requires a document uploaded to be signed on DocuSign" )
Column.Formula: EBMS_GET_EFORMRECORD_ATTACHMENT_COUNT(EFormType, RecordID, "DocuSign") > 0

Column.Name: User in Everyone
Column.Formula: HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Everyone")

Column.Name: Validation
User is in Assigned Group
Attachments Exists
Column.Formula: IF( AND( [Status] <> "Draft", [Attachments Exists] == NULL ), EBMS_GET_ATTACHMENTS(EFormType, RecordID, "Submission Documents") <> ARRAY() )

Column.Name: Parent Structure
Parent Chain
Column.Formula: HASH_GET([Parent Structure], "Parent Chain")

Column.Name: User to Group Mapping
Global Settings
Column.DefaultValueFormula:
LET $columns:= ARRAY( "External EDRMS", "Name of EDRMS" );
RETURN INDEXES_TO_KEYS( DB_LOOKUP( $columns, "Global Settings", "[LineNumber] = 1" ), $columns )

Column.Name: Significant Parent EFormType
Significant Parent RecordID
Internal Submitter Notes
Column.Formula: IF( AND( [Status] <> "Draft", [Internal Submitter Notes] = NULL() ), "No notes provided", [Internal Submitter Notes] )

Binding.Expression: AND( HASH_GET(HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Mapping"), "System Builders"), [Selected View] = NULL )

FormulaCriterion.Formula: OR(EACH [Approver Decision] = ARRAY(), ARRAY_LENGTH(ARRAY_WHERE(EACH [Approver Decision], $(i, item) OR($item = "In Progress", $item = "Pending"))) >= 1)
OR(EACH [Approver Decision] = ARRAY(), ARRAY_LENGTH(ARRAY_WHERE(EACH [Approver Decision], $(i, item) OR($item = "In Progress", $item = "Pending"))) = 1)

Binding.Expression: "< Return to " & HTMLENCODE(COALESCE(ARRAY_FIRST([Return Record]), ARRAY_FIRST([Parent Record])))
OR( ARRAY_FIRST([Return Record]) <> NULL, ARRAY_FIRST([Parent Record]) <> NULL )

LET $parentName := IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Procurement Title", [Parent EFormType], "[RecordID] = " & [Parent RecordID] ), NULL );
RETURN "Approval for " & IF( OR( [Parent EFormType] = "Procurement", [Parent EFormType] = "Procurement-UI" ), "Procurement Plan: " & $parentName, [Parent EFormType] ) & IF( [Round] > 1, " - Approval round: " & [Round] )

LET $result := ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Approver], $(i, item) NEWUUID() );
RETURN IF( $result = ARRAY(), ARRAY(NEWUUID()), $result )

Binding.Expression: AND( ARRAY_INDEX([Parent Record], 2) >0, [Next Round RecordID] = NULL, OR( [Status] = "Cancelled", [Status] = "Rejected" ) )

Label.Text: This will cancel this submission. After cancelling the original submission can be modified and re-submitted. A resubmitted submission has to get approvals from all required approvers even if approval was previoulsy granted from individuals in the approval route.

Binding.Expression: AND( OR( EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER() = [Submitted By], EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER() = [Originator], HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Administrators") = TRUE ), [Show Functions] = TRUE, [Status] <> "Voided" )

Label.Text: Force approval of this submission. Executes the final approval, skipping any inbetween steps.

FormulaCriterion.Formula: OR(EACH [Approver Decision] = ARRAY(), ARRAY_LENGTH(ARRAY_WHERE(EACH [Approver Decision], $(i, item) OR($item = "In Progress", $item = "Pending"))) >= 1)

Binding.Expression: AND( HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "Administrators") = TRUE, [Show Functions] = TRUE, [Status] <> "Voided" )
HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "System Builders") = TRUE
HASH_GET([User to Group Mapping], "System Builders") = TRUE

TextCriterion.Text:
CASE
-- These users should always have access to the Submission WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Assignee(s)]) THEN TRUE
--if the significant parent is not a Contract, these users will always be able to access the record WHEN [Significant Parent EFormType] <> 'Contract' AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
-- next we have to step to the submission itself, in order to check if the user is in the full array of approvers WHEN (STEP TO [Submission] ON [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- If parent is Evaluation, check if the user is Procurement Manager/Officer or a Panel Member WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' THEN (STEP TO PARENT [Evaluation] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Panel Member Username] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0)
--check if the current user is in an account associated with the vendor on the Contract this submission relates to WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' AND [Significant Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN ( CASE WHEN --check the Contract to validate that Vendor Access is enabled, and that vendors have access to the action the submission was raised from (STEP TO [Contract] ON [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Significant Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( ('Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Extension') OR ('Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Variation') OR ('Work Orders' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Work Order') OR ('Payment Certificates' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Payment Certificate') ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
THEN ( --check if the user is in a Contact account associated with the Vendor linked to the significant parent Contract (STEP TO [Contract] ON [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Significant Parent RecordID] STEP TO [Contact] ON CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
--else check if the user is in the organisational account of the Vendor linked to the significant parent Contract (STEP TO [Contract] ON [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Significant Parent RecordID] STEP TO [Vendor] ON CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] GET COUNT(0)) > 0 )
ELSE FALSE END )
-- If significant parent is Contract, return the standard list of users who have access to that record WHEN [Significant Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN (STEP TO [Contract] ON [Significant Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CASE --check that the user is in one of the assigned roles on the Contract - they should always have access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] THEN TRUE --check that the contract is not restricted - if not, these users can access in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0)
-- If significant parent is Procurement, but parent is not an Evaluation, return the standard list of users who have access to that record WHEN [Significant Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' AND [Parent EFormType] <> 'Evaluation' THEN (STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Significant Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0)
ELSE FALSE END
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Assignee(s)]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Approver]

CASE WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Assignee(s)]) THEN TRUE
WHEN (STEP TO [Submission] ON [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
--check if the current user is in an account associated with the vendor on the Contract this submission relates to WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' AND [Significant Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN ( CASE WHEN --check the Contract to validate that Vendor Access is enabled, and that vendors have access to the action the submission was raised from (STEP TO [Contract] ON [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Significant Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( ('Extensions' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Extension') OR ('Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Variation') OR ('Work Orders' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Work Order') OR ('Payment Certificates' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Payment Certificate') ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
THEN ( --check if the user is in a Contact account associated with the Vendor linked to the significant parent Contract (STEP TO [Contract] ON [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Significant Parent RecordID] STEP TO [Contact] ON CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
--else check if the user is in the organisational account of the Vendor linked to the significant parent Contract (STEP TO [Contract] ON [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Significant Parent RecordID] STEP TO [Vendor] ON CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] GET COUNT(0)) > 0 )
ELSE FALSE END )
ELSE FALSE END

Event.Name: Calculate Approvers
Event.Description: Doesn't Save; Good for previewing a route without committing a change

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [User Type], $(i, item) IF( $item = "External", TRIM(ARRAY_INDEX(SPLIT(ARRAY_INDEX(ARRAY_INDEX([Approver Data], 2), $i), ","), 1)), ARRAY_INDEX(ARRAY_INDEX([Approver Data], 2), $i) ) )

ARRAY_SELECT( ARRAY_INDEX([Approver Data], 3), $(i, item)
LET $name := ARRAY_INDEX(ARRAY_INDEX([Approver Data], 1), $i); RETURN IF( $item = "External", TRIM(ARRAY_INDEX(SPLIT(ARRAY_INDEX(ARRAY_INDEX([Approver Data], 2), $i), ","), 1)), $name = NULL(), "Not Found",
$name ) )

ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [User Type], $(i, item) IF( $item = "External", TRIM(ARRAY_INDEX(SPLIT(ARRAY_INDEX(ARRAY_INDEX([Approver Data], 2), $i), ","), 2)),
EBMS_GET_ROLE_EMAIL_ADDRESSES([Approver]#$i) ) )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [User Type], $(i, item) IF( $item = "External", TRIM(ARRAY_INDEX(SPLIT(ARRAY_INDEX(ARRAY_INDEX([Approver Data], 2), $i), ","), 1)), ) )

IF( ARRAY_LENGTH(ARRAY_INDEX([Approver Data], 2)) > 0, ARRAY_SELECT(ARRAY_INDEX([Approver Data], 2), $(i, item) TRUE),
ARRAY(TRUE) )

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH_MERGE( $eventargs, HASH("eventtype", "Approved (Final)") )
[RecordID]

TriggerCustomEvent.TargetRecordsFormula: ARRAY( ARRAY_INDEX( ARRAY_SELECT( [Hash Values], $(i, item) ARRAY_FIRST($item)), 2 ) )

Event.Name: Get Approvers
Event.Description: Run on creation of record; Saves;

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Push to DocuSign -- if first docusign approval that needs to happen

FormulaCriterion.Formula:
LET $line := ARRAY_LENGTH(ARRAY_WHERE(EACH [Approval Assigned], $(i, item) $item = TRUE)); //3 LET $firstDocuSignLine := ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Approval Type], "DocuSign");
RETURN AND( [Approval Type]#$line = "DocuSign", $firstDocuSignLine = $line )

FormulaDriven.FileDefinitionsFormula: ARRAY(HASH( "type", "recordspdf", "filename", "Submission.pdf", "records", ARRAY( ARRAY_CONCAT([Parent Record], HASH_GET($eventargs, "pdfview") ) //ARRAY(Eformtype,recordid, view) ) ))

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH_MERGE( $eventargs, HASH("eventtype", "Approved") )

FormulaCriterion.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "Email Submitter of Endorsements", "Settings - Approval", "[RecordID] = 1" ) = TRUE

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "guid", HASH_GET($eventargs, "guid"), "Comment", HASH_GET($eventargs, "Comment") )
HASH( "guid", HASH_GET($eventargs, "guid"), "Comment", HASH_GET($eventargs, "Comment") )
HASH( "guid", HASH_GET($eventargs, "guid"), "Comment", HASH_GET($eventargs, "Comment") )

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(0, GREATEST(3, ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [LineExists]))), $(i, item) TRUE )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [LineExists], $(i, item) COALESCE([User Type]#$i, "System User") )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [LineExists], $(i, item) IF( [Approver is System User]#$i = TRUE, EBMS_GET_ROLE_DISPLAYNAME([Approver]#$i), NULL() ) )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [LineExists], $(i, item) COALESCE([Approval Type]#$i, "In System") )

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH_MERGE( $eventargs, HASH("eventtype", "Rejected") )
[RecordID]

FormulaCriterion.Formula: AND( ARRAY([Parent Record]) <> ARRAY(NULL()), ARRAY([Parent Record]) <> ARRAY() )

FieldEntry.Formula: "Submitter: " & [Submitter Display Name] & NEWLINE() & "Submission type: " & [Type] & NEWLINE() & "Value: " & NUMBERFORMAT([Submission Value], "C") & NEWLINE()
HASH( "Internal Notes", [Internal Submitter Notes], "External Notes", [Submitter Notes] )

Event.Name: Update Assignee Data
Event.Description: Updates fields related to current Assignee on moving to next approver or adding/removing approvers

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Approval Batch], $(i, batch) $batch <= [Assigned Approval Batch] )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Approver Decision], $(i, item) IF( OR( $item = "Pending", $item = "In Progress" ), "Cancelled" ), $item )
